dcterms:description: The Waymo Open Motion Dataset consists of 1.1M examples time-windowed from 103K 20s scenarios, derived from real-world driving in urban and suburban environments. Each example includes 1 second of history state and 8 seconds of future, testing the model's ability to capture a large field of view and scale to an output space of trajectories.
dcterms:title: Waymo Open Motion Dataset

dcterms:description: The Argoverse dataset consists of 333K scenarios containing trajectory histories, context agents, and lane centerline inputs for motion prediction. The trajectories are sampled at 10Hz, with 2 seconds of past history and a 3-second future prediction horizon.
dcterms:title: Argoverse
